segments.text: Look at these kids, so full of mischief in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on the stool, sneaking into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got that plate ready, clever kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching up, excited for her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, mom's drying dishes, none the wiser.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink's overflowing, but hey, adds to the fun chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water splashing everywhere, like a little indoor rain.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, framing the scene nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool might tip, but they'll probably catch themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies are the best reward for a bit of adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in her apron, looking all domestic and sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle on the floor? Just more to splash in later.
segments.speaker: PAR
